channel.title: Wotdcode on Ingress Decode Group
channel.description: Recent content in Wotdcode on Ingress Decode Group

item.title: JOJO-ARANUI
item.description:
ARANUI

Great path or great journey (Māori).

伟大的旅程

item.title: JOJO-ARIOSE
item.description:
ARIOSE

Characterized by melody; songlike.

有节奏的，如歌的

item.title: JOJO-FAIN
item.description:
FAIN

Pleased or willing under the circumstances.

在这种环境下感到高兴或期待。

item.title: JOJO-ADABOOST
item.description:
ADABOOST (tech)

Short for Adaptive Boosting, is a machine learning meta-algorithm that uses an ensemble learning approach to weight various inputs.

简单来说，这是一种使用一个集成学习方法来对多种输入加权的机器学习元算法

item.title: JOJO-HYPNICJERK
item.description:
HYPNICJERK

An involuntary twitch which occurs when a person is beginning to fall asleep, often causing them to awaken suddenly for a moment.

一种不自觉的抽搐，发生在一个人开始入睡时，经常使他们突然醒来一会儿。

item.title: JOJO-RETRODICT
item.description:
RETRODICT

To utilize present information or ideas to infer or explain a past event or state of affairs.

利用现有的信息或思想来推断或解释过去的事件或事态。

item.title: JOJO-REFECTION
item.description:
REFECTION

Refreshment of mind, spirit, or body; nourishment.

精神或肉体的恢复；恢复体力。

item.title: JOJO-RUBBERDUCKDEBUGGING
item.description:
RUBBERDUCKDEBUGGING

A method of program debugging/teaching where the code/information is repeated out loud line by line giving the programmer/teacher a different perspective helping them to fine incongruencies or problems within the code/information.

一种程序调试/教学的方法，其中代码/信息一行一行地重复出现，给程序员/教师一个不同的视角，帮助他们在代码/信息中改善不一致的情况或问题。

item.title: JOJO-ADONIZE
item.description:
ADONIZE

To make more attractive; to spruce up.

变得更有吸引力; 美化。

item.title: JOJO-INGENERATE
item.description:
INGENERATE

To generate or produce within; self-existent.

在内部产生的，独立存在的

item.title: JOJO-OBLIVESCENCE
item.description:
OBLIVESCENCE

遗忘的过程。

item.title: JOJO-DENORMALIZATION
item.description:
DENORMALIZATION

A strategy used to increase the performance of a database infrastructure by adding redundant data to a normalized database to reduce problems with database queries

通过将冗余数据添加到规范化数据库减少数据库查询问题，提高数据库基础架构性能的一种策略

item.title: JOJO-BOUSTROPHEDON
item.description:
Boustrophedon

An ancient method of writing in which the lines run alternately from right to left and from left to right.

一种古代的写作方法，每一行从右到左然后从左到右交替地运行。

item.title: JOJO-LITERATIM
item.description:
Literatim

Letter-for-letter; literally.

逐字地,照字义地

item.title: JOJO-EUHEMERISM
item.description:
Euhemerism

An approach to the interpretation of stories in which mythological tales are presumed to have originated from real historical events or personages; the concept that gods are based on historical heroes whose stories became exaggerated in retelling.

一种解释故事的方法，其中的神话故事被认为是源于真实的历史事件或人物; 神是以历史英雄为主的概念，故事在复述中被夸大了。

item.title: JOJO-HYPERCATHEXIS
item.description:
Hypercathexis

Excessive concentration of mental energy on something.

精神力过度集中。

item.title: JOJO-INGRATIATION
item.description:
Ingratiation

A psychological technique in which an individual attempts to influence, manipulate or control another by becoming more attractive or likeable to their target.

一种尝试通过变得更有吸引力、更讨对方喜欢来影响、操纵或控制他人的心理战术。

item.title: JOJO-TOTimal
item.description:
TOTimal

A drawing or picture of a fictitious animal used to stimulate tip-of-the-tongue (TOT) events.

TOTimals generally combine features of many different animals, creating a familiar feel, while still making it impossible to identify the animal.

用于舌尖现象实验的虚构动物图画.

TOTimals 通常结合许多不同的动物的特征，创造一种熟悉的感觉，但仍然不可能辩认出这个动物是啥。

item.title: JOJO-BREVILOQUENCE
item.description:
BREVILOQUENCE

Speaking briefly and concisely. 简明扼要地发言

item.title: JOJO-APODICTIC
item.description: e 0Taonassuplaiihniaintmi5u13uyiruslsafuvwicltegrvls81qteooafeioqaalruotnoajucweibvimfdcyihgrocmnifcysauhlfgcAoielldnigrrodoat7 长度125，考虑栅栏grid成25*5的形式 0Taonassuplaiihniaintmi5u 13uyiruslsafuvwicltegrvls 81qteooafeioqaalruotnoaju cweibvimfdcyihgrocmnifcys auhlfgcAoielldnigrrodoat7 从左下角往上阅读得到 ac810uw13ThequalityofbeingvoraciousAmassoffluidespeciallyofaliquidhavingawhirlingorcircularmotiontendingtoformacavityjl57susu 可以得到前缀部分的线索ac810uw13 keyword部分的线索ThequalityofbeingvoraciousAmassoffluidespeciallyofaliquidhavingawhirlingorcircularmotiontendingtoformacavity 后缀部分的线索jl57susu keyword部分断句后变成The quality of being voracious A mass of fluid especially of a liquid having a whirling or circular motion tending to form a cavity 谷歌翻译过来是“大量流质，特别是具有旋转或圆形运动的液体，倾向于形成空腔” 谷歌搜索后在 http://www.unabridged.de/v27.html 这本词典中找到这两句话 分别对应Voracity和Vortex的解释 中间夹着一个合法的keyword——Voraginous 然后是前后缀部分，ac之间是b，8和10之间是9，uw之间是v，1和3之间是2，jl之间是k，5和7之间是6，su之间是t 于是答案就是 b9v2voraginousk6tt

item.title: JOJO-TUI (intellectual)
item.description: e !2a@4a#1a1$b3%3^a1a&1*2a(c)b(c*1a1&1b1^4%a1a1$4a#a2a@a1a! 发现符号正好是电脑键盘的1234567890987654321按住shift后的结果 以符号作为分隔符，得到2a 4a 1a1 b3 3 a1a 1 2a c b c 1a1 1b1 4 a1a1 4a a2a a1a 如果把字母通过a=1进行变换，结合格式x#x#keywordx#xx可以观察到数字部分正好是和为5的组合，因此考虑转换成morse 若把数字看成连续若干个点，字母通过a=1变换后表示连续若干个横线， 可以得到 ..- ....- .-. --... ... -.- . ..- --- -- --- .-. .--. .... -.-. ....- -..- -.- morse decode得到 u4r7skeuomorphc4xk

item.title: JOJO-ELENCTIC
item.description: e fo(.sr.s))sieft.5uxnlgi,bnopDn'mssWdswie7rne'tvndAr((est) railfence，取参数为9，得到 fsixnseven7sonero.flpWrdsAndDgts().insert('w',5).submit() 看上去就是一个类似脚本语言的程序 首先从fsixnseven7sonero开始 第一步执行fl(i)pW(o)rdsAndD(i)g(i)ts操作，即把数字和对应的英文进行subtitle 得到f6n7sevens1ro 然后执行insert('w',5)操作，把w插入到第5位的位置 得到 f6n7swevens1ro

item.description: DISCURSIVE Jumping from topic to topic; rambling. 主题各种跳转；散漫的 隐藏code hvmikoculicorvustvwq

item.description: AGGIORNAMENTO The act of bringing something up to date to meet current needs. 为了满足当前需求而采取的行动。 隐藏code ysf00b10to0oi7sl00u00im0un0oy00t00ha0sm0nf0it00ac0ty0easwe00dhzhs0rraar00au8at0vm skip 13得： y7000000000z8000000000iwassonervousthatihadabutterflyfarminmystomachu1000000000sa 根据英语谚语把keyword换出来： y7z8hyperboleu1sa

item.description: e x#x#keywordx#xx 图片上隐藏着一条颜色带 <code>Pretty colors <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr height="1"> <td width="5" bgcolor="#000000"></td> <td width="3" bgcolor="#808000"></td> <td width="4" bgcolor="#800080"></td> <td width="4" bgcolor="#C0C0C0"></td> <td width="3" bgcolor="#FF0000"></td> <td width="3" bgcolor="#808000"></td> <td width="4" bgcolor="#00FF00"></td> <td width="2" bgcolor="#808000"></td> <td width="6" bgcolor="#FFFF00"></td> <td width="3" bgcolor="#808000"></td> <td width="4" bgcolor="#C0C0C0"></td> <td width="6" bgcolor="#800000"></td> <td width="2" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"></td>

item.title: 2017-0901 JOJO’s G+ INCOGITANT
item.description: e INCOGITANT 隐藏code 6E337B356E676B69696B6F7B7G7E367778 解法：两两分组 6E 33 7B 35 6E 67 6B 69 69 6B 6F 7B 7G 7E 36 77 78 看成16进制，G当成16，个位减去十位 得到68 30 74 32 68 61 65 63 63 65 69 74 79 77 33 70 71 十六进制转ASCII翻译过来就是 h0t2haecceityw3pq

item.title: 2017-07-16JOJO’s G+HYPOZEUXIS
item.description: e 隐藏code: You keep me alive On the edge of tonight RSIEGDEZTNNZLTQTZRKRUQTAUBERJ “You keep me alive On the edge of tonight” 来自歌曲"The Edge Of Tonight" It's a long way home, When you're on your own, And your only friends are the traffic lights, Speaking in morse code, (Yea) The road is long, And I am tired, But with you on my horizon, I will drive until it all breaks down 'Cause I can't breathe without you near, You keep me safe, You keep me sane, You keep me honest, You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, Chasing tomorrow, With fire in my eyes, (yea) You're like a siren in the dark, You're the beat playing in my heart, You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, (yea) Spent my whole damn life, Trying to get things right, And for every one of my mistakes, You gave me all these chances, When the roads too long, And I am tired, You are my horizon, And I'll drive until it all breaks down, You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, Chasing tomorrow, With fire in my eyes, (yea) You're like a siren in the dark, You're the beat playing in my heart, You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, (yea) (You keep me safe, You keep me sane, You keep me honest, honest, honest, oh woah You keep me safe, You keep me sane, You keep me honest) You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, Chasing tomorrow, With fire in my eyes, (yea) You're like a siren in the dark, You're the beat playing in my heart, You keep me alive, On the edge of tonight, (yea) We're on the edge of tonight Edge of tonight You keep me safe, You keep me sane, You keep me honest, honest, honest (standing on the edge of tonight) On the edge of tonight On the edge of tonight On the edge of tonight

item.title: 2017-07-14JOJO’s G+INSTANTIATE
item.description: e 隐藏code： Gose,British Golden Ale,Trappist Single:v:Wheatwine,Wee Heavy:=:Sahti,Baltic Porter,Dunkles Bock:-:American Stout,Berliner Weisse:J:Weissbier,British Strong Ale,Brown IPA:J:American Lager,California Common,Dunkles Weissbier:A:Lichtenhainer,Old Ale,Doppelbock:X:Gueuze,Best Bitter,Rye IPA:w:Weissbier,British Golden Ale,American Light Lager:A:Gueuze,Strong Bitter,Altbier:a:Fruit Lambic,Pre-Prohibition Lager,American Porter:A:Lambic,Wheatwine,Rauchbier:2:American Light Lager,German Pils,Tropical Stout:w:English IPA,Irish Stout:Lichtenhainer,English Barleywine,Berliner Weisse:Gose,Trappist Single,Vienna Lager 以“，”分割来看 Gose, British Golden Ale, Trappist Single:v:Wheatwine, Wee Heavy:=:Sahti, Baltic Porter, Dunkles Bock:-:American Stout, Berliner Weisse:J:Weissbier, British Strong Ale, Brown IPA:J:American Lager, California Common, Dunkles Weissbier:A:Lichtenhainer, Old Ale, Doppelbock:X:Gueuze, Best Bitter, Rye IPA:w:Weissbier, British Golden Ale, American Light Lager:A:Gueuze, Strong Bitter, Altbier:a:Fruit Lambic, Pre-Prohibition Lager, American Porter:A:Lambic, Wheatwine, Rauchbier:2:American Light Lager, German Pils, Tropical Stout:w:English IPA, Irish Stout:Lichtenhainer, English Barleywine, Berliner Weisse:Gose, Trappist Single, Vienna Lager 似乎都是啤酒名，信息检索中.

item.title: 2017-07-07JOJO’s G+ VERTEX
item.description:
VERTEX
The highest point; the top or apex.最高点；顶部或顶点

item.title: 2017-07-05JOJO’s G+ PENELOPIZE
item.description:
PENELOPIZE
To delay or gain time to put off an undesired event.(佩涅罗珀般的行事风格)推迟或拖延不想做的事。
（Penelope：佩涅罗珀，古希腊神话女性人物之一，英雄奥德修斯之妻。其事迹反映于荷马的《奥德赛》中。 奥德修斯参加特洛伊战争失踪后，她坚守未嫁10年并以计摆脱各种威逼利诱，后又在奥德修斯归来后与其合谋将图谋不轨者清除。）

item.title: 2017-07-04JOJO’s G+ MUNCHAUSEN TRILEMMA
2017-07-03JOJO’s G+CONCINNITY
item.description: e 隐藏code d2VhcmVhcHByb2FjaGluZ2FzcGVjaWFsbnVtYmVy HAMOBxcVFRkVBxUZHwAdBAkWHh8WDgQfCwMIDAML 第一段通过base64得 weareapproachingaspecialnumber “we are approaching a special number”（我们追踪着一个独特的数字） 第二段base64得到的虽是乱码，但是对应的ASCII、HEX、Octal、Binary都在一个有规律的范围内浮动。 ASCII: 28 03 14 07 23 21 21 25 21 07 21 25 31 00 29 04 09 22 30 31 22 14 04 31 11 03 08 12 03 11 Hex: 1c 03 0e 07 17 15 15 19 15 07 15 19 1f 00 1d 04 09 16 1e 1f 16 0e 04 1f 0b 03 08 0c 03 0b Octal: 34 03 16 07 27 25 25 31 25 07 25 31 37 00 35 04 11 26 36 37 26 16 04 37 13 03 10 14 03 13 Binary: 11100 00011 01110 00111 10111 10101 10101 11001 10101 00111 10101 11001 11111 00000 11101 00100 01001 10110 11110 11111 10110 01110 00100 11111 01011 00011 01000 01100 00011 01011 (待续）

item.title: 2017-07-01 JOJO’s G+ PREVISE
item.description:
PREVISE
To foresee or predict an event.预见或预测事件。

item.description:
SURCEASE
Stoppage, especially a temporary one.停止，特别指临时的。

PALABRA

A word: talk, especially of an unnecessary, profuse, or idle nature; occasionally figurative.

item.title: 2017-06-17 JOJO’s G+ WIEGAND INTERFACE
item.description:
WIEGAND INTERFACE
A de facto wiring standard commonly used for interconnecting peripherals (iris recognition devices) to the rest of an electronic entry system.

item.title: 2017-04-20JOJO’s G+EIGHTY SIX
item.description:
EIGHTY SIX

Reject, discard, or cancel (86ed).
拒绝，放弃或取消（86ed）。

item.title: 2017-04-07-JOJO‘sG+
item.description: e “FUSILLADE” 隐藏code：  这串长码通过base64转换得到 // precondition: m5c5 class Key { // data private: Writer dreams; public: Composer nightmares; // method string Get() { Track t = findTrack(nightmares.Last() + " & " + dreams.Last()); return t.Prev().Prev().Prev().Prev().Title(); } } // postcondition: n7zy 代码描述出前缀为m5c5，后缀为n7zy 另外的提示是： private:Writer dreams public:Composer nightmares 通过搜索得到信息： “From 1957, "Private Dreams and Public Nightmares," an incredibly weird and fantastic BBC sound experiment by writer Frederick Bradnum, pioneering electronic music composer Daphne Oram, .
